data.client_settings: Can reproduce on Stable 0.0.298 and Canary 0.0.163
data.expected_result: The box where you have the image and can add a message appears and the file uploads then
data.short_description: Dragging files into Discord from Explorer Quick Access screen does not add the file (Submitting from https://feedback.discordapp.com/forums/326712/suggestions/18877141 )
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a channel you have send Message and Upload Files permissions for - Drag in an image from the Quick Access Explorer page
